items.title: Version - 6.1.7
items.content: core/search block has now support for button only - openning the search form in a Boostrap modal (must have Gutenberg plugin until merged into core).

items.title: Special thanks to:
items.content: Translation contributors: Dan Caragea, Vlad T, Peter Smits, Olivier Van Eester, Pieterjan Deneys.
